display_time_template:
Your current timezone is: {timezone}. 
Local time: {localTime}
click_the_link:
Click the link below and Fredo will extract your timezone. 
{link}
timezone_change_success_template:
Great, we have set your new timezone. 

Your current timezone is: {timezone}. 
Local time: {localTime}

 Send *tz* anytime you want to edit this.
timezone_change_failed:
I could not parse your local time. 
Please try again to send me your current local time. 
 
Use these format HH:MM. 
(E.g. 16:35, 04:35pm)
